Q_DESC: Take a string as input from the user. Take two words as input, the word which the user wants to replace and its substitute. Your task is to write a program that finds and replaces each occurrence of that word.
TESTCASE_1:
Welcome Ram
Ram
Kumar
###---###SEPERATOR---###---
Welcome Kumar
